rows.label: tlk46400078_01_msg0001
rows.name:
For many years we have followed
without question the path the
Pope has decreed for us.

rows.label: tlk46400078_01_msg0002
rows.name:
But all these refugees... I mean,
it's not the welcoming of the refugees
itself that I object to, exactly.

rows.label: tlk46400078_01_msg0003
rows.name:
But the camp where they all currently
reside, it used to be a beautiful plaza
with fountains, and, well, look at it now.

rows.label: tlk46400078_01_msg0004
rows.name:
If only there were more land in Acedia,
we might be able to at least build
them proper houses to live in...
